channel.title: Goal to 99 Runecrafting! -- Screenshots, Invites [UPDATED 11/7/10]
channel.description:
~~~~~CURRENT STATUS: RUNECRAFTING~~~~~
[NEW!]
SORRY FOR THE LACK OF UPDATES....
Current Progress As Of 11/7/10 9:20 PM Central Time
[IMG]http://img294.imageshack.us/img294/1935/bot14.png[/img]
98 Runecrafting finally!!!!!!!
[IMG]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/9391/bot15.png[/img]
Me and my best RS Friend
[IMG]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/456/wifey.png[/img]
My Inventory for Boss Hunting(Not my whole bank, just some items. Missing my phats and other items)
[IMG]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/6143/bankx.png[/img]
96 RCING! One more Level till all RC Effigies!!!!!
[IMG]http://img547.imageshack.us/img547/8199/bot13.png[/img]
Still 93 RCING, New Bank Update. 20.2K XP/Hour [IMG]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/2193/bot11.png[/img]
93 Rune Crafting and A Picture of the RC Tab [IMG]http://img301.imageshack.us/img301/6348/bot10.png[/img]
These next 3 Images Go together, Still 92 RCING. 93 today.
RC Tab, Boxed Items are important. [IMG]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/452/bot9p1.png[/img]
Selling 226K Natures for 190GP Each, for 43M [IMG]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/926/bot9p2.png[/img]
Total XP in my XP Counter with some Skills Shown. [IMG]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/8547/bot9p3.png[/img]
92 Runecrafting, The Runes/Essence counter fucked up, so just remember, it's 2X the amount of essence for Runes [IMG]http://img837.imageshack.us/img837/6208/bot8.png[/img]
91 Rune Crafting, NATURE RUNE TIME! Screenshot of 1 Day 18 Hours and Total Amount of Astrals and More! [IMG]http://img408.imageshack.us/img408/9759/bot7.png[/img]
Just Woke Up! Progress Report of 1 Day 7 Hours! Stuff Outlined Is Stuff Worth Looking At. [IMG]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/2802/bot6.png[/img]
Just got home from school, 18 Hours of botting! [IMG]http://img203.imageshack.us/img203/9859/bot4.png[/img]
90 Rune Crafting! [IMG]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/5062/bot3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/1632/bot1e.png[/img]
200 Trips Progress Report [IMG]http://img686.imageshack.us/img686/9215/bot2g.png[/img]
~~~~~~OLDER PICTURES~~~~~~~
Using a Bot I Made Here's My Progress Report [IMG]http://img826.imageshack.us/img826/3566/sastralspro.png[/img]
My Best Impetious Impulses Progress Report [IMG]http://img806.imageshack.us/img806/5245/lolhb.png[/img]
An Old Old OLD Picture Of My Bank [IMG]http://img218.imageshack.us/img218/338/bankea.png[/img]
Me Catching A Kingly On Mos Le'Harmless [IMG]http://img169.imageshack.us/img169/2559/kingly.png[/img]
My Friend With 3B Looking Like A Newb [IMG]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/577/lolnewb.png[/img]
An OLD Picture Of My Combat Tab [IMG]http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/9065/mycombattab.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://img295.imageshack.us/img295/9265/81324437.png[/img]
A Picture of Me and Some Friends [IMG]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/5576/bannerfinished.png[/img]
A Picture Of My Girlfriends Claw Special :P [IMG]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/8812/screenie1l.png[/img]
My Girlfriends Account 1 Week After Playing [IMG]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/6316/37022137.png[/img]
99 Mining :P [IMG]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/8421/99mining.png[/img]
~~YOUR INVITED~~
To My 99 Rune Crafting Party!
When: Not Available Yet. Current Level: 89, 90 in 9 hours.
[PEOPLE COMING TO THE PARTY]:
1.)xLEET BLADEx 2.)the elve age 3.)Macktat 4.)Scipyo 5.)Shrogg 6.)Keith(RS FRIEND) 7.)Angel(RS FRIEND) 8.)Kat(RS FRIEND) 9.)Brandon(RS FRIEND) 10.)Joshee(RS FRIEND) 11.)Ryan(RS FRIEND) 12.)Purple 0wnz(Trying to get Angel too invite him :o Famous Pkers FTW?)
[NOTE]: This thread will be updated regularly.

no black people don’t have rights.

He’s black? In that case, IDK…I usually don’t give out free auths. I might just sell one of my pures and raffle one off on here.
[/quote]No prima I’m pretty white ?

u want to be black tho :).[/quote]

:o How do you know :?

item.title: Goal to 99 Runecrafting! -- Screenshots, Invites [UPDATED 11/7/10]
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

[quote=“Old Rsc Player, post:38, topic:365310”][quote author=wolfs goal link=topic=461515.msg3377837#msg3377837 date=1287786445]

You say you bot, yet you post your stats.

if jagex checks this thread your done.

“If Jagex checks this thread your done.”

Correction, by terms of service, you cannot be an employee of Jagex or affiliated with Jagex in basically any way that can get Jagex involved.

Anyhow, yeah…Stuff and more Stuff.

Jagex reserve the right to do anything with your account.
Doesnt matter if they view this forum or not.

I never said they can’t touch my account. I said they can’t come on here. Learn To Read The Full Post.
[/quote]

They come on here. TOS doesnt do shit. If they did come on here, how would you know they did? You wouldnt.[/quote]

Okay, so if they do, I don’t care.

Read full topic
